    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static org.gbif.doi.metadata.datacite.DataCiteMetadata convert(org.gbif.api.model.registry.Dataset d,
                                                                      org.gbif.api.model.registry.Organization publisher)
        Convert a dataset and publisher object into a datacite metadata instance. DataCite requires at least the following properties:
        • Identifier
        • Creator
        • Title
        • Publisher
        • PublicationYear
        As the publicationYear property is often not available from newly created datasets, this converter uses the current year as the default in case no created timestamp or pubdate exists.

      • truncateDescription
